TITLE: Edit Account Details - FastComments
HEADING: Account Details
EMAIL_VERIFIED_SUCCESS: Success! Your email has been verified.
VERIFICATION_EMAIL_SENT: Sent email verification email. Check your email inbox at <%- user.pendingEmail %> for a link to complete the process.
DISPLAY_NAME_HELP: This is used on your comments instead of your username.
EMAIL_PENDING_VERIFICATION: This email is pending verification. The email <%- user.email %> is still used.
WEBSITE_URL_HELP: Your username will link to this in comment threads. Note that not all communities have this feature enabled.
BIO_HELP: This will appear on your public profile. Maximum 500 characters.
COUNTRY_HELP: This will display a flag emoji on your profile.
ERROR_RATE_LIMITED_MINUTE: You have exceeded our rate limits. Please try again in a few minutes or reach out to support.
ERROR_RATE_LIMITED_DAY: You have exceeded our daily rate limits. Please try again in 24 hours or reach out to support.
